name: Campout! The Ultimate Kids' Guide
description: Did you know you can tell the temperature by counting cricket chirps? This kids’ guide to the outdoors is packed with neat outdoor facts, activities, experiments, and games. Whether you’re planning an overnight in the backyard or a weekend camping in the wilderness, bring this book to get kids interested in the trees, animals, insects, and night sky around them. Also has tasty recipes for meals like solar oven pizza and 8 types of s’mores.
